name: pinole
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of flour used in Latin American food and drinks, consisting of dried, crushed, and cooked maize (= yellow seeds from a tall plant), mixed with other ingredients such as sugar, spices, and cacao : We use the corn to make pinole. When pinole is dissolved in water, it makes a delicious, thirst-quenching, and nutritious drink.
